item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses,

“<st data-num="01696" class="">Tell</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st> to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st><n id="1" /> an <st data-num="08641" class="">offering</st><n id="2" /> for me; <st data-num="0853" class="">from</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">person</st> <st data-num="05068" class="">motivated by a willing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st> you<n id="4" /> are to <st data-num="03947" class="">receive</st> my <st data-num="08641" class="">offering</st>.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="08641" class="">offering</st> you<n id="1" /> are to <st data-num="03947" class="">accept</st> <st data-num="0853" class="">from</st> them: <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>,

<st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08438 08144" class="">scarlet</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="05795" class="">goats’ hair</st>,<n id="5" />

<st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">skins</st> <st data-num="0119" class="">dyed red</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08476" class="">fine</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07848" class="">acacia</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>,

<st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> for the <st data-num="03974" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="01314" class="">spices</st> for the <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> and for <st data-num="05561" class="">fragrant</st> <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>,

<st data-num="07718" class="">onyx</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>, and other <st data-num="068" class="">gems</st> to be <st data-num="04394" class="">set</st> in the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st> and in the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>.

Let them <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st><n id="1" /> for me a <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st>,<n id="2" /> so that I may <st data-num="07931" class="">live</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> them.
According to all that I am showing you—the pattern of the tabernacle and the pattern of all its furnishings—you must make it exactly so.
“They are to make an ark of acacia wood—its length is to be 45 inches, its width 27 inches, and its height 27 inches.

You are to <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st><n id="1" /> it with <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>—both <st data-num="01004" class="">inside</st> and <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> you must <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> it,<n id="2" /> and you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="02213" class="">border</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> it.

You are to <st data-num="03332" class="">cast</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> for it and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">feet</st>, with <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">side</st> and <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="08145" class="">other</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">side</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> of <st data-num="07848" class="">acacia</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> them with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>,

and <st data-num="0935" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> into the <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="06763" class="">sides</st> of the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> in order to <st data-num="05375" class="">carry</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> with them.

The <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> must <st data-num="01961" class="">remain</st> in the <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> of the <st data-num="0727">ark</st>; they must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it.
You are to put into the ark the testimony that I will give to you.
“You are to make an atonement lid of pure gold; its length is to be 45 inches, and its width is to be 27 inches.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="02091">gold</st>; you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> them of <st data-num="04749" class="">hammered metal</st> on the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st>.

<st data-num="06213" class="">Make</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03742" class="">cherub</st> on <st data-num="02088" class="">one</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">end</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03742" class="">cherub</st> on the <st data-num="02088" class="">other</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">end</st>; <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st><n id="3" /> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st>.

The <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st> are to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="06566" class="">spreading</st> their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st>, <st data-num="05526" class="">overshadowing</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st> with their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st>, and the <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> to <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">other</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">looking</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st>.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">top</st> of the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st>, and <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> you are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> I am <st data-num="05414" class="">giving</st> you.

I will meet with you there, and from above the atonement lid, from between the two cherubim that are over the ark of the testimony, I will speak with you about all that I will command you for the Israelites.
“You are to make a table of acacia wood; its length is to be 36 inches, its width 18 inches, and its height 27 inches.

You are to <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> it with<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, and you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="02213" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> for it.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="04526" class="">frame</st><n id="1" /> for it <st data-num="02948" class="">about three inches broad</st>, and you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="02213" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> for its <st data-num="04526" class="">frame</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> for it and <st data-num="05414" class="">attach</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">corners</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> its <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">legs</st> are.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> are to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05980" class="">close</st> to the <st data-num="04526" class="">frame</st> to provide <st data-num="01004" class="">places</st><n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> to <st data-num="05375" class="">carry</st> the <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> of <st data-num="07848" class="">acacia</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st> and <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> them with <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, so that the <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st> may be <st data-num="05375" class="">carried</st> with them.<n id="1" />

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> its <st data-num="07086" class="">plates</st>,<n id="1" /> its <st data-num="03709" class="">ladles</st>,<n id="2" /> its <st data-num="07184" class="">pitchers</st>, and its <st data-num="04518" class="">bowls</st>, to be used in <st data-num="05258" class="">pouring out</st> offerings;<n id="3" /> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> them of <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>.
You are to set the Bread of the Presence on the table before me continually.
“You are to make a lampstand of pure gold. The lampstand is to be made of hammered metal; its base and its shaft, its cups, its buds, and its blossoms are to be from the same piece.

<st data-num="08337" class="">Six</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> are to <st data-num="03318" class="">extend</st> from the <st data-num="06654" class="">sides</st> of the lampstand,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> of the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st> from <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="06654" class="">side</st> of it and <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> of the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st> from the <st data-num="08145" class="">other</st> <st data-num="06654" class="">side</st> of it.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="07969" class="">Three</st> <st data-num="01375" class="">cups</st> <st data-num="08246" class="">shaped like almond flowers</st> with <st data-num="03730" class="">buds</st> and <st data-num="06525" class="">blossoms</st> are to be on <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branch</st>, and <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="01375" class="">cups</st> <st data-num="08246" class="">shaped like almond flowers</st> with <st data-num="03730" class="">buds</st> and <st data-num="06525" class="">blossoms</st> are to be on the <st data-num="0259" class="">next</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07070" class="">branch</st>, and the <st data-num="03651" class="">same</st><n id="2" /> for the <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">extending</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st>.

On the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st> there are to be <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="01375" class="">cups</st> <st data-num="08246" class="">shaped like almond flowers</st> with <st data-num="03730" class="">buds</st> and <st data-num="06525" class="">blossoms</st>,

with a <st data-num="03730" class="">bud</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the first<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it, and a <st data-num="03730" class="">bud</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the next<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it, and a <st data-num="03730" class="">bud</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the third<n id="3" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it, according to the <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">branches</st> that <st data-num="03318" class="">extend</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st>.
Their buds and their branches will be one piece, all of it one hammered piece of pure gold.
“You are to make its seven lamps and then set its lamps up on it, so that it will give light to the area in front of it.

Its <st data-num="04457" class="">trimmers</st> and its <st data-num="04289" class="">trays</st><n id="1" /> are to be<n id="2" /> of <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>.

<st data-num="03603" class="">About 75 pounds</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> is to be <st data-num="06213" class="">used</st> for it<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0854" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>.
Now be sure to make them according to the pattern you were shown on the mountain.
